>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from get_coins_by_ids","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with requested coins","required":["coins"],"properties":{"coins":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["coin_id","address","amount"],"properties":{"address":{"type":"string"},"amount":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0}],"title":"Amount"},"clawback_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"coin_id":{"type":"string"},"created_height":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int32","minimum":0},"created_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"offer_id":{"type":["string","null"]},"spent_height":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int32","minimum":0},"spent_timestamp":{"type":["integer","null"],"format":"int64","minimum":0},"transaction_id":{"type":["string","null"]}},"title":"CoinRecord"},"description":"List of coins matching the requested IDs"}},"title":"GetCoinsByIdsResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
